alert.note: Alert for Crowley County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Wild Horse Point, or 31 miles north of La Junta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
